pages.text: Affects grace spells only. Triple Grace XP gained on spell-cast, and increases the duration of grace spells by 30%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter brims with a raw life force that blesses the caster and those around them with good health. Imbues onto the Clerics Scepter as you progress on the Clerics Path of Redemption
